headline: Assessing Ulta Beauty’s Valuation After Recent Store Expansion and 7% Price Drop
summary: Wondering if Ulta Beauty’s impressive run means there is still value left on the table? You are not alone; this beloved beauty retailer is on many investors’ watchlists. The stock has climbed 44.9% over the past year and is up 15.9% year-to-date, but has recently pulled back by 7.1% in the last week and 5.0% over the last month. Recent news has spotlighted Ulta’s continued innovation and focus on store expansions, helping to shore up investor confidence despite the broader retail market’s...

headline: Ulta Beauty to Report Third Quarter Fiscal 2025 Results on December 4, 2025

headline: Do Wall Street Analysts Like Ulta Beauty Stock?
summary: Despite Ulta Beauty’s strong performance relative to the broader market over the past year, Wall Street analysts remain cautiously optimistic about the stock’s prospects.
